1035.name: Emberknife
1035.description:
7% Omnivamp vs. Monsters
  • Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite and increases its damage to monsters. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. During this time, you deal 48 - 125 (based on level)bonus true damage to them over 2.5 seconds on hit and take 20% reduced damage from them.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

1039.name: Hailblade
1039.description:
7% Omnivamp vs. Monsters
  • Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite and increases its damage to monsters. When smiting champions Chilling Smite deals 20 - 156 (based on level)true damage and steals 20% of their Move Speed for 2 seconds.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1040.name: Obsidian Edge
1040.description:
8% Omnivamp vs. Monsters
  • Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Auto Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Attack-Smite, increasing its damage to monsters.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

1055.name: Doran's Blade
1055.description: • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Drain: Restore 1 Mana every second. Damaging an enemy champion increases this amount to 1.5 Mana every second for 10 seconds. If you can't gain Mana, regenerate 45% of the value as Health instead.

1082.name: Dark Seal
1082.description:
• Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stack for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 5 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 4 Ability Power per stack of Glory .Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer .

1083.name: Cull
1083.description:
• Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap .

1502.name: Reinforced Armor
1502.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats>UNIQUE Passive - Reinforced Armor: Reduces incoming damage by 0% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby.</MainText>

1506.name: Reinforced Armor
1506.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats>UNIQUE Passive - Base Turret Reinforced Armor: Reduces incoming damage by 0% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby. Base turrets have health regeneration, but cannot regenerate past their current segment. Base turrets are segmented at 33%, 66% and 100% health.</MainText>

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink the potion to restore <Healing>150 Health </Healing>over 15 seconds.<Rules>You may carry up to 5 Health Potions.</Rules></MainText>

2010.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
2010.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Eat the biscuit to restore <Healing>10% missing Health </Healing>and <ScaleMana>Mana </ScaleMana>over 5 seconds. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants <ScaleMana>50 maximum Mana </ScaleMana>.</MainText>

2015.name: Kircheis Shard
2015.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Jolt: Energized Attacks gain an additional 80 magic damage .

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Consumes a charge to restore <Healing>125 Health </Healing>over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Consumes a charge to restore <Healing>125 Health </Healing>and <ScaleMana>75 Mana </ScaleMana>over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for <MagicDamage>15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage </MagicDamage>over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.<Rules>Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.</Rules></MainText>

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
• Recovery: Restores 20 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Undaunted: Blocks 15 damage from attacks and spells from champions (25% effectiveness vs. damage over time abilities).
  • Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Serves a scrumptious scoop to a nearby Poro, causing it to grow in size.</MainText>

2055.name: Control Ward
2055.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>traps, reveal <KeywordStealth>Camouflaged </KeywordStealth>enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.<Rules>You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.</Rules></MainText>

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
2065.description:
Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies 30% Move Speed for 4 seconds (75s cooldown).
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.An ally can only be affected by Motivate once every 4 seconds.

2138.name: Elixir of Iron
2138.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 300 Health, 25% Tenacity, and increased champion size for 3 minutes. While Active, moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champions' Move Speed by 15%.<Rules>Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2139.name: Elixir of Sorcery
2139.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 50 Ability Power and <ScaleMana>15% Mana Regen </ScaleMana>for 3 minutes. While Active, damaging a champion or turret deals <TrueDamage>25 bonus true damage </TrueDamage>(5s cooldown).<Rules>Champion level <Attention>9</Attention>or greater required to purchase. Elixir of Sorcery's true damage effect has no cooldown when attacking turrets. Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2140.name: Elixir of Wrath
2140.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 30 Attack Damage and 12% Physical Vamp (against champions) for 3 minutes.<Rules>Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2419.name: Commencing Stopwatch
2419.description: • Transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Takedowns reduce this timer by 2 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 250 gold to the items it builds into.Stopwatch normally contributes 650 gold

2420.name: Stopwatch
2420.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>Use one time only to become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a <RarityGeneric>Broken Stopwatch </RarityGeneric>).</MainText>

2421.name: Broken Stopwatch
2421.description: • Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

2422.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
2422.description: • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

2423.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
2423.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>Use one time only to become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a <RarityGeneric>Broken Stopwatch </RarityGeneric>).</MainText>

2424.name: Broken Stopwatch
2424.description: • Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

3001.name: Evenshroud
3001.description: • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take 9% increased damage for 4 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Armor and Magic Resist

3003.name: Archangel's Staff
3003.description:
• Awe: Gain Ability Haste equal to 0.5% bonus Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Seraph's Embrace .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability or Attack to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Muramana .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3009.name: Boots of Swiftness
3009.description: • The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

3011.name: Chemtech Putrifier
3011.description: • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding another ally will enhance both of you, causing the next damage to enemy champions to apply 40% Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3026.name: Guardian Angel
3026.description: • Saving Grace: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

3031.name: Infinity Edge
3031.description: • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain35% Critical Strike Damage.

3033.name: Mortal Reminder
3033.description: • Sepsis: Dealing physical damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. Dealing 2 consecutive Attacks to an enemy champion enhances this effect to 40% Grievous Wounds against them until the effect is allowed to elapse.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3036.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
3036.description: • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

3040.name: Seraph's Embrace
3040.description:
• Awe: Gain Ability Haste equal to 1.3% bonus Mana .
  • Empyrean: Restore Health equal to 25% of Mana spent, up to 25-50 (+10% AP) per cast. Toggle abilities can heal up to the same value per second.

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
3041.description:
• Glory: Gain 4 stacks for a champion kill or 2 stacks for an assist (up to 25 stacks total). Lose 10 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory . Gain 10% Move Speed if you have at least 10 stacks.Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Dark Seal .

3042.name: Muramana
3042.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Shock: Attacks against champions deal an additional 1.5% Max Mana physical damage On-Hit. Damaging Abilities against champions deal an additional (3.5% for Melee users | 2.7% for Ranged users) Max Mana + 6% Total AD physical damage .

3044.name: Phage
3044.description: • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore 1.6% max Health over 6 seconds.Restoration reduced to 50% for Ranged users.

3046.name: Phantom Dancer
3046.description: • Spectral Waltz: Attacks grant Ghosting and 7% Move Speed for 3 seconds. In addition, Attacking 4 times causes Spectral Waltz to also grant 30% Attack Speed for the same duration.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

3050.name: Zeke's Convergence
3050.description:
Active - Conduit: Designate an Accomplice (60s cooldown).
  • Convergence: For 8 seconds after you Immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's Attacks and Ability hits apply an additional (30 - 70 (based on level)(+1.5% max Health)(+7.5% Ability Power) magic damage to that enemy.Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.

3051.name: Hearthbound Axe
3051.description: • Nimble: Attacking a unit grants (20 | 10 for Ranged champions) Move Speed for 2 seconds.

3053.name: Sterak's Gage
3053.description:
• The Claws that Catch: Gain 45% of base AD as bonus Attack Damage.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 75% Bonus HP Shield, decaying over 3.75 seconds (60s ).

3057.name: Sheen
3057.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

3065.name: Spirit Visage
3065.description: • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

3068.name: Sunfire Aegis
3068.description:
• Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (12 - 30 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
  • Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5%Tenacity and Slow Resist and 50Health.

3070.name: Tear of the Goddess
3070.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana.Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3071.name: Black Cleaver
3071.description:
• Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 5% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 30% Armor reduction).
  • Rage: Dealing physical damage to a champion grants 3 Move Speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds.

3072.name: Bloodthirster
3072.description: • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 320 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

3074.name: Ravenous Hydra
3074.description: • Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.Deals a minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to units at the end of its range, can only hit each target once per Attack or Ability, and doesn't trigger off of periodic damage.Cleave does not trigger on structures.

3075.name: Thornmail
3075.description: • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 20% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 25%Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 40%Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3076.name: Bramble Vest
3076.description: • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal 4 magic damage to the attacker and apply 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3077.name: Tiamat
3077.description: • Cleave: Attacks deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other nearby enemies.Minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to enemies furthest away.Cleave does not trigger on structures.

3078.name: Trinity Force
3078.description:
• Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 4% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 20% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3Attack Damage, 3Ability Haste, and 3Move Speed

3082.name: Warden's Mail
3082.description: • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to 5 + (0.35% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

3083.name: Warmog's Armor
3083.description: • Warmog's Heart: If you have at least 1100 bonus Health, restore 5% max Health per second if damage hasn't been taken within 6 seconds (3 seconds for non-Champions).

3085.name: Runaan's Hurricane
3085.description: • Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (40% Attack Damage) physical damage . Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.Item is for Ranged champions only.

3089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
3089.description: • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

3091.name: Wit's End
3091.description: • Fray: Attacks apply 15 - 80 (based on level) magic damage On-Hit and grant 20 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

3094.name: Rapid Firecannon
3094.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage . In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

3095.name: Stormrazor
3095.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains 120 bonus magic damage . In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies by 75% for 0.5 seconds.

3100.name: Lich Bane
3100.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (75% base Attack Damage + 50% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

3102.name: Banshee's Veil
3102.description: • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

3107.name: Redemption
3107.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Intervention: </Active>Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore <Healing>180 - 340 (scales with ally level) Health </Healing>to allies and burn enemy champions for <TrueDamage>10% max Health true damage </TrueDamage>(90s cooldown).<Rules>Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and Healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another <Active>Intervention </Active>. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.</Rules></MainText>

3109.name: Knight's Vow
3109.description:
Active - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy (60s cooldown).
  • Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 10% of damage they take to you and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to Champions. If they have less than 30% Health the damage reduction is increased to 20%.Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time. Damage redirection stops if you have less than 30% Health

3110.name: Frozen Heart
3110.description:
• Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 20%.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to 7 + (3.5 per 1000 max Health), capped at 40% of the Attack's damage.

3111.name: Mercury's Treads
3111.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Rules>Tenacity reduces the duration of <Status>Stun </Status>, <Status>Slow </Status>, <Status>Taunt </Status>, <Status>Fear </Status>, <Status>Silence </Status>, <Status>Blind </Status>, <Status>Polymorph </Status>and <Status>Immobilizing </Status>effects. It has no effect on <Status>Airborne </Status>or <Status>Suppression </Status>.</Rules></MainText>

3112.name: Guardian's Orb
3112.description:
• Recovery: Restores 10 Mana every 5 seconds. If you can't gain mana, restores 15 Health instead.
  • Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

3115.name: Nashor's Tooth
3115.description: • Icathian Bite: Attacks apply (15 + 20% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit.

3117.name: Mobility Boots
3117.description:
25Move Speed
  • When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

3119.name: Winter's Approach
3119.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Health equal to 8% Total Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability or Attack to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Fimbulwinter .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3121.name: Fimbulwinter
3121.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Health equal to 8% Total Mana.
  • Everlasting: Immobilizing or Slowing (Melee only) an enemy champion consumes 3% current Mana and grants a Shield for 3 seconds, absorbing 100-180 + 4.5% current Mana damage (8s). The Shield is increased by 80%if more than one enemy is nearby.This effect only activates while you have greater than 20% Mana.

3123.name: Executioner's Calling
3123.description: • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3124.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
3124.description:
• Wrath: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 40On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.
  • Seething Strike: Every third Attack applies your On-Hit effects twice.Wrath cannot benefit from more than 100% Critical Strike Chance.Wrath's On-Hit damage conversion is affected by Critical Strike damage modifiers.

3139.name: Mercurial Scimitar
3139.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding <Status>Airborne </Status>) and also gain 50% Move Speed for 1 second (90s cooldown).</MainText>

3140.name: Quicksilver Sash
3140.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Removes all crowd control debuffs (excluding <Status>Airborne </Status>) (90s cooldown).</MainText>

3142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
3142.description:
Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

3143.name: Randuin's Omen
3143.description:
Active - Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to 5 + (0.35% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

3145.name: Hextech Alternator
3145.description: • Revved: Damaging a champion deals an additional 50 - 125 (based on level) magic damage (40s cooldown).

3152.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
3152.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supersonic: </Active>Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal <MagicDamage>(125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage </MagicDamage>. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Magic Penetration.<Rules>Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.</Rules></MainText>

3153.name: Blade of The Ruined King
3153.description:
• Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (12% for Melee users | 8% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

3155.name: Hexdrinker
3155.description: • Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain 110 - 280 (based on level) magic damage Shield for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).

3156.name: Maw of Malmortius
3156.description: • Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain (200 + 225% bonus Attack Damage [75% Shield Size for Ranged Users]) magic damage Shield for 5 seconds (75s cooldown). When Lifeline triggers, gain 8% Omnivamp until the end of combat.

3157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
3157.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>You become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).</MainText>

3158.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
3158.description: • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

3165.name: Morellonomicon
3165.description: • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 40% Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3179.name: Umbral Glaive
3179.description: • Blackout: When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you for 8 seconds (40s cooldown). Your Attacks instantly kill revealed traps and do triple damage to Wards.

3181.name: Hullbreaker
3181.description: • Boarding Party: While no allied champions are nearby you gain (10 - 75 / 5 - 37.5) Armor and Magic Resist and Attacks deal 20% increased damage to towers. Nearby large minions gain (30 - 225 / 15 - 112.5) Armor and Magic Resist and 200% increased damage to towers.Boarding Party's resistances decay over 3 seconds when an ally gets too close.

3190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
3190.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 180 - 330 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 3 Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2Armor/Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.Subsequent Devotion shields within 20 seconds only have 25% effect.

3193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
3193.description:
Active - Unbreakable: Gain a (100 + 90% bonus Health) Shield that decays and grow 25% in size for 2.5 seconds. (90s cooldown).
  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 5% bonus Armor and 5% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

3211.name: Spectre's Cowl
3211.description: • Incorporeal: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds (duration increases with damage taken).

3222.name: Mikael's Blessing
3222.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Purify: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs (except <Status>Knockups </Status>and <Status>Suppression </Status>) from an ally champion and restore <Healing>100 - 180 (based on ally level) Health </Healing>(120s cooldown).</MainText>

3330.name: Scarecrow Effigy
3330.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats>Cannot be sold <Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Places an effigy that lasts for 130 - 300 (based on level) seconds and appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores one charge every 115 - 30 (based on level) seconds, up to maximum 2 charges.Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.</MainText>

3340.name: Stealth Ward
3340.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between <ScaleLevel>90 - 120</ScaleLevel>seconds, is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every <ScaleLevel>240 - 120</ScaleLevel>seconds.</MainText>

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities <ScaleLevel>(198 - 99s cooldown)</ScaleLevel>.</MainText>

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds <ScaleLevel>(90 - 60s cooldown)</ScaleLevel>.</MainText>

3400.name: Your Cut
3400.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Gain 0 gold.<Rules>Bonus gold given to an ally when Pyke executes an enemy champion using his Ultimate Ability. If no ally was involved in the kill, Pyke gets to keep the Cut!</Rules></MainText>

3504.name: Ardent Censer
3504.description: • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

3508.name: Essence Reaver
3508.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as Mana (1.5s cooldown).

3513.name: Eye of the Herald
3513.description:
Active - Consume: Crush the Eye of the Herald after 1 second, summoning the Rift Herald to siege enemy turrets.
  • Glimpse of the Void: The holder of the Eye of the Herald has Empowered Recall .The Eye of the Herald will be lost to the Void if not used within 240 seconds.

3599.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3599.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.</MainText>

3600.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3600.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.<Rules>Required to use <Attention>Kalista's </Attention>Ultimate Ability.</Rules></MainText>

3742.name: Dead Man's Plate
3742.description: • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 40 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 40 (+100% base Attack Damage) physical damage . If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

3748.name: Titanic Hydra
3748.description:
• Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% bonus Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.Cleave's shockwave does not trigger on structures.

3802.name: Lost Chapter
3802.description: • Enlighten: Upon levelling up, restores 20% max Mana over 3 seconds.

3814.name: Edge of Night
3814.description: • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

3850.name: Spellthief's Edge
3850.description:
• Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Frostfang , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3851.name: Frostfang
3851.description:
Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

3854.description:

  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Runesteel Spaulders , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3916.name: Oblivion Orb
3916.description: • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

4005.name: Imperial Mandate
4005.description: • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 45 - 75 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds (6s cooldown per champion). Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15Ability Power.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

4401.name: Force of Nature
4401.description:
• Absorb: Taking magic damage from enemy Champions grants a stack of Steadfast (max 6) for 7 seconds. Enemy Immobilizing effects grant an additional 2 stacks.
  • Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast , take 25% reduced magic damage and gain 10% increased Move Speed.One spell can add a new stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

4628.name: Horizon Focus
4628.description: • Hypershot: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Slowing or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

4629.name: Cosmic Drive
4629.description: • Spelldance: Damaging a champion with 3 separate Attacks or Spells grants 15% Move Speed (decaying to 5%) and 40 Ability Power until exiting champion combat.

4633.name: Riftmaker
4633.description: • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 3% bonus damage (max 9%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2%Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

4636.name: Night Harvester
4636.description: • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (30s cooldown per champion).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

4637.name: Demonic Embrace
4637.description:
• Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.8/1% (Melee/Ranged)max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds.
  • Dark Pact: Gain 2% of your bonus Health as Ability Power.

4638.name: Watchful Wardstone
4638.description: • Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.After completing the Support Quest and reaching Level 13, transforms into Vigilant Wardstone .

4641.name: Stirring Wardstone
4641.description:
• Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Blooming Empire: This item transforms into Watchful Wardstone once 15 Stealth Wards have been placed.Stealth Wards are placed from the Stealth Ward Trinket and the upgraded Unique: Support items.

4643.name: Vigilant Wardstone
4643.description:
• Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.
  • Blessing of Ixtal: Grants a 12% increase to bonus Health, bonus Attack Damage, Ability Haste, and Ability Power.Upgrades from Watchful Sightstone .

4644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
4644.description:
• Divine Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage by 75%. Safeguard persists for 1.5 seconds after taking champion damage. (40 second cooldown).
  • Holy Gift: While Safeguarded and for 3 seconds after it is broken, gain 10-40 Ability Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Move Speed and 8 Ability Power.

4645.name: Shadowflame
4645.description: • Cinderbloom: Damage to champions benefits from 10 to 20 additional Magic Penetration based on their current Health (max benefit when the target has 1000 or less Health). If the target was recently affected by Shields, gain the maximum benefit against that target (20 bonus Magic Penetration ).

6029.name: Ironspike Whip
6029.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Crescent: </Active>Deal <PhysicalDamage>(100% Base Attack Damage) physical damage </PhysicalDamage>to nearby enemies. (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).</MainText>

6035.name: Silvermere Dawn
6035.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding <Status>Airborne </Status>) and gain 40% Tenacity and 40% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).</MainText>

6333.name: Death's Dance
6333.description:
• Ignore Pain: 30% (10% for Ranged users) of damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool and restore 120% bonus AD in Health over 2 seconds.

6609.name: Chempunk Chainsword
6609.description: • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 25%Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 40%Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

6616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
6616.description: • Rapids: Healing or Shielding another ally grants you both 25 - 45 Ability Power and 20 Ability Haste for 4 seconds.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

6617.name: Moonstone Renewer
6617.description: • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 60 Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power by 5% (stacking up to 5 times).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 8increase to Starlit Grace's Heal.

6630.name: Goredrinker
6630.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Thirsting Slash: </Active>Deal <PhysicalDamage>(175% Base Attack Damage) physical damage </PhysicalDamage>to nearby enemies. Restore <Healing>(20% Base Attack Damage + 8% missing Health)</Healing>for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>7</Attention>Ability Haste.</MainText>

6631.name: Stridebreaker
6631.description:
Active - Halting Slash: Deal (175% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste). Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2%Move Speed.

6632.name: Divine Sunderer
6632.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 125% base Attack Damage + 6% (3% for Ranged owners) target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, also heal for 65% of the premitigation damage .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3%Armor Penetration and 3%Magic Penetration.Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

6653.name: Liandry's Anguish
6653.description:
• Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health (maxed at 1250 bonus Health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (12.5 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.

6655.name: Luden's Tempest
6655.description: • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Magic Penetration.

6656.name: Everfrost
6656.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Glaciate: </Active>Deal <MagicDamage>(100+30% Ability Power) magic damage </MagicDamage>in a cone, <Status>Slowing </Status>enemies by 65% for 1 second. Enemies at the center of the cone are <Status>Rooted </Status>instead (30s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>10</Attention>Ability Power.</MainText>

6660.name: Bami's Cinder
6660.description: • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

6662.name: Frostfire Gauntlet
6662.description:
• Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (12 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
  • Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds and deal (12 - 85 / 6 - 42.5) bonus magic damage to all enemies in the area (4s cooldown, 6s cooldown for ranged champions). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% for melee champions and 12.5% for ranged champions (increased by your max Health).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100Health and 6%Size.

6664.name: Turbo Chemtank
6664.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supercharged: </Active>Grants 40% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that <Status>Slows </Status>nearby champions by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).<Passive>Refuel: </Passive>Moving and taking damage from Champions and large monsters fills up the Chemtank. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals <MagicDamage>40-120 (+1% max Health, + 3% Move Speed) magic damage </MagicDamage>to all nearby enemies (increased by 30% against minions and 200% against jungle monsters).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Ability Haste and <Attention>50</Attention>Health.</MainText>

6670.name: Noonquiver
6670.description: • Precision: Attacks deal an additional 20 physical damage to Minions and Monsters.

6671.name: Galeforce
6671.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Cloudburst: </Active>Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of <MagicDamage>(180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage </MagicDamage>, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (110s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>2%</Attention>Move Speed.<Rules>Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.</Rules></MainText>

6672.name: Kraken Slayer
6672.description: • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals an additional (50 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) true damage .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10%Attack Speed.

6673.name: Immortal Shieldbow
6673.description: • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 630 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15-35 Attack Damage for 8s (90s cooldown).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Attack Damage and 70Health.

6675.name: Navori Quickblades
6675.description: • Deft Strikes: Your critical strikes with Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

6676.name: The Collector
6676.description: • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

6677.name: Rageknife
6677.description: • Wrath: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 35On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.

6691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
6691.description: • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (75 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for melee / 55 + 25% bonus Attack Damage for ranged) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste and 5Move Speed.

6692.description: • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional Item_Melee_Ranged_Split_C % max Health physical damage , grants you 15% Move Speed and a (160 + 35% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (50% shield for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions). Item_Mythic_Passive 4%Armor Penetration and 5Move Speed.

6693.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Sandswipe: </Active>Dash through target enemy champion, dealing <PhysicalDamage>(75 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage </PhysicalDamage>. For the next 3 seconds, you deal 15% increased damage to the target. (90s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Lethality and <Attention>5</Attention>Move Speed.</MainText>

6695.name: Serpent's Fang
6695.description: • Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain by (50% | 35% for Ranged Champions) for 3 seconds. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them by (50% | 35% for Ranged Champions).Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

6696.name: Axiom Arc
6696.description: • Flux: Whenever a Champion dies within 3 seconds of you having damaged them, refund 20% of your Ultimate Ability's total cooldown.

7000.name: Sandshrike's Claw
7000.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Sandswipe: </Active>Dash through target enemy champion, dealing <PhysicalDamage>(75 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage </PhysicalDamage>. (90s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Lethality and <Attention>5</Attention>Move Speed.</MainText>

7001.name: Syzygy

Item_Mythic_Passive 4%Armor Penetration and 5Move Speed.

7002.name: Draktharr's Shadowcarver
7002.description: • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (75 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for melee / 55 + 25% bonus Attack Damage for ranged) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste and 5Move Speed.

7003.name: Turbocharged Hexperiment
7003.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supercharged: </Active>Grants 40% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that <Status>Slows </Status>nearby champions by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).<Passive>Refuel: </Passive>Moving and taking damage from Champions and large monsters fills up the Chemtank. 7004.name: Forgefire Crest
7004.description:
• Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (12 - 30 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
  • Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5%Tenacity and Slow Resist and 50Health.

7005.name: Rimeforged Grasp
7005.description:
• Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (12 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
  • Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds and deal (12 - 85 / 6 - 42.5) bonus magic damage to all enemies in the area (4s cooldown, 6s cooldown for ranged champions). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% for melee champions and 12.5% for ranged champions (increased by your max Health).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100Health and 6%Size.

7006.name: Typhoon
7006.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Cloudburst: </Active>Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of <MagicDamage>(180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage </MagicDamage>, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (110s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>2%</Attention>Move Speed.<Rules>Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.</Rules></MainText>

7007.name: Wyrmfallen Sacrifice
7007.description: • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals an additional (50 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) true damage .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10%Attack Speed.

7008.name: Bloodward
7008.description: • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 630 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15-35 Attack Damage for 8s (90s cooldown).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Attack Damage and 70Health.

7009.name: Icathia's Curse
7009.description: • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 3% bonus damage (max 9%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2%Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

7010.name: Vespertide
7010.description: • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (30s cooldown per champion).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

7011.name: Upgraded Aeropack
7011.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supersonic: </Active>Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal <MagicDamage>(125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage </MagicDamage>. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Magic Penetration.<Rules>Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.</Rules></MainText>

7012.name: Liandry's Lament
7012.description:
• Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health (maxed at 1250 bonus Health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (12.5 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.

7013.name: Eye of Luden
7013.description: • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Magic Penetration.

7014.name: Eternal Winter
7014.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Glaciate: </Active>Deal <MagicDamage>(100+30% Ability Power) magic damage </MagicDamage>in a cone, <Status>Slowing </Status>enemies by 65% for 1 second. Enemies at the center of the cone are <Status>Rooted </Status>instead (30s cooldown).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>10</Attention>Ability Power.</MainText>

7015.name: Ceaseless Hunger
7015.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Thirsting Slash: </Active>Deal <PhysicalDamage>(175% Base Attack Damage) physical damage </PhysicalDamage>to nearby enemies. Restore <Healing>(20% Base Attack Damage + 8% missing Health)</Healing>for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>7</Attention>Ability Haste.</MainText>

7016.name: Dreamshatter
7016.description:
Active - Halting Slash: Deal (175% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste). Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2%Move Speed.

7017.name: Deicide
7017.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 125% base Attack Damage + 6% (3% for Ranged owners) target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, also heal for 65% of the premitigation damage .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3%Armor Penetration and 3%Magic Penetration.Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

7018.name: Infinity Force
7018.description:
• Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 4% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 20% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3Attack Damage, 3Ability Haste, and 3Move Speed

7019.name: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn
7019.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 180 - 330 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 3 Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2Armor/Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.Subsequent Devotion shields within 20 seconds only have 25% effect.

7020.name: Shurelya's Requiem
7020.description:
Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies 30% Move Speed for 4 seconds (75s cooldown).
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Ability Haste.An ally can only be affected by Motivate once every 4 seconds.

7021.name: Starcaster
7021.description: • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 60 Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power by 5% (stacking up to 5 times).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 8increase to Starlit Grace's Heal.

7022.name: Seat of Command
7022.description: • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 45 - 75 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds (6s cooldown per champion). Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15Ability Power.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

7023.name: Equinox
7023.description: • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take 9% increased damage for 4 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Armor and Magic Resist

7024.name: Caesura
7024.description:
• Divine Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage by 75%. Safeguard persists for 1.5 seconds after taking champion damage. (40 second cooldown).
  • Holy Gift: While Safeguarded and for 3 seconds after it is broken, gain 10-40 Ability Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Move Speed and 8 Ability Power.

8001.name: Anathema's Chains
8001.description:
Active - Vow: Choose a Nemesis to start building a Vendetta (90s).
  • Vendetta: Take up to 30% reduced damage from your Nemesis, 1% per Vendetta stack. You gain stacks over time, and reach the maximum number of stacks after 60 seconds.
  • Vengeance: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has 20% reduced Tenacity while near you.Active can be cast while dead and at global range. Stacks reset upon choosing a new target. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in-combat with champions."She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction. The gauntlets heard."

8020.name: Abyssal Mask
8020.description: • Unmake: Curse nearby enemy champions, reducing their Magic Resist by 5 + 1.2% bonus Health (max 25). For each Cursed enemy, gain 9 Magic Resist.
